sentences.english: At the cost balance point on the institutional margin, the allocation of power achieves Pareto Optimality.
sentences.chinese: 在制度边际成本持平处权力的配置达到帕累托最优。

sentences.english: Optimality Conditions for a Class of Generalized Semi-infinite Programming;
sentences.chinese: 并给出了非线性半定规划的最优性必要和充分条件。

sentences.english: Optimization controller for linear discrete-time state space model is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计出线性离散状态空间的最优控制器。

sentences.english: Its optimal solution is obtained by finding a nonnegative solution of compatible equations.
sentences.chinese: 其最优解是通过求一个相容方程组的非负解而得到。

sentences.english: The optimum design of low loss beam expanding prism system is suggested.
sentences.chinese: 提出了扩束棱镜透过性能的最优设计方法。

sentences.english: The optimal production control policy is given for a single-machine single type product production system.
sentences.chinese: 结合单设备单产品情况，给出了其最优生产控制策略。

sentences.english: Layout problem is a combinatory optimization problem.
sentences.chinese: 布局问题是一个组合最优化问题。

sentences.english: Average sample-path optimality for DTMDP in Borel spaces.
sentences.chinese: 一般状态空间中的平均样本轨道最优性问题。

sentences.english: The solving method for the optimal solution of the overbooking model is given based on chaos optimization algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 基于混沌优化算法给出了求解最优超订水平的方法。

sentences.english: An optimal control problem based on universal variable is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了普适变量下状态方程的最优控制问题。

sentences.english: That is the length of anklet that is optimal.
sentences.chinese: 这是长度脚炼是最优的。

sentences.english: Has studied vrum processing craft, screens the most superior craft parameter combination.
sentences.chinese: 研究了奶皮子的加工工艺，筛选出最优工艺参数组合。

sentences.english: Also the simulation results show its optimality.
sentences.chinese: 仿真结果证实了该界的最优性。

sentences.english: An algorithm for data approximation with global optimal biarc spline is presented in this article.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用整体最优双圆弧样条拟合离散数据点的算法。

sentences.english: In addition, the duty cycle of pulse has an optimum value for a certain launched power.
sentences.chinese: 对于一定的发射功率，脉冲占空比有一个最优值。

sentences.english: The result shows that there exists a class of optimal phase-covariant quantum cloning.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明存在一类最优相位协变量子克隆。

definition: in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
to make every effort to/striving to do one's best
